name: EarthKids
0:
”Alexa Open earth kids”
”Alexa Start earth kids”
”Alexa Launch earth kids”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: earth kids
des:
Earth Kids is a fun filled game which aims to achieve 2 great things at the same time.
One, it helps the user to have lots of fun and Two, it helps them to learn more about the beautiful planet Earth in a fun filed way and most importantly educates them on how to preserve the Earth and how their lives can be made more beautiful even as they take steps to protect the Earth. 
It tells them simple ways in which they can put in their efforts by very simple actions and our skill does so in away that the users find it easy to remember.
Benefits of this skill
Helps you to learn and have fun at the same time
Very well designed to help you learn and remember complex things easily
A creative way to protect and help the Earth
Good way to spend time
Very engaging
Improves knowledge
Improves skills
Motivates to carry out social responsibilities

Have fun as you learn with Earth Kids!!!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
